column3: Latest;Siem Reap: A fire completely engulfed a house on August 18
column7: Siem Reap.------According to the local police
column8: the owner of the house was Khun Mao
column9: a 63-year-old female.------The house destroyed by the fire was wooden
column10: measuring 5 meters by 7 meters. Tens of thousands of dollars of property were lost
column11: and the fire is suspected of being caused by an electrical fault.------7 fire trucks and 5 water trucks took almost 2 hours for the blaze to be extinguished. ------NKD
